碆字的基本解释

碆
bō
古代射鸟用的拴在丝绳上的石箭镞：“矰碆飞流。”
把石头箭镞拴在丝绳上，用来射鸟：“则出宝弓，碆新缴。”

碆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bō］
［《廣韻》博禾切，平戈，幫。］
［《廣韻》薄波切，平戈，並。］
附石于弋缴以备射击。

碆字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　碆； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页831第42
【廣韻】博禾切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】逋禾切，?音波。石可爲弋鏃。【史記·楚世家】碆新繳。【馬融·廣成頌】矰碆飛流。本作磻。　又【廣韻】薄波切，音婆。纜繳石。亦音盤。

碆字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
碆字的起名意思

暂无。

碆
Basic explanation of words
碆
bō
The ancient stone arrowhead tied to a silk rope used to shoot birds: "Flying."
Tie the stone arrowhead to the silk rope to shoot birds: "The bow will be made and the new will be paid."
碆
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bō］
["Guang Yun" Bo Heqie, Ping Ge, Bang. ]
["Guang Yun" Bo Boche, Ping Ge, and. ]
Attach a stone to Yi pay for shooting.
碆
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　碆; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 831 42
[Guang Yun] Bo He Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Bu He cut, sound wave. The stone can be Yi Yun. 【Historical Records·Chu Family】The new payment. 【Ma Rong·Guangcheng Song】Weily fly. This is a knack.　[Guang Yun] Bo Boqie, Yin Po. The cable pays the stone. Also sound disk.
